children.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
children.info: Our platform offers a well-structured and comprehensive curriculum designed by language experts, covering everything from basic grammar to advanced vocabulary and conversation skills. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your English proficiency, our courses cater to all levels.

children.title: Interactive Learning Experience
children.info: Engage with our interactive lessons that make learning English fun and effective. We incorporates activity, practice, videos, and interactive exercises to help you retain information better and keep you motivated throughout your learning journey.

children.title: Personalized Learning Paths
children.info: Our platform adapts to your individual learning style and pace, providing a personalized learning path that focuses on your strengths and addresses your weaknesses. This approach ensures you make steady progress and achieve your language goals faster.

aboutFive.name: John Lee
aboutFive.title: The Founder Of Histudy Academy.
aboutFive.info: Web teacher and leacture for future development.

aboutSix.title: What is EET English?
aboutSix.desc: A new era of anytime, anywhere learning has begun, and its goal is to improve education globally and make it more widely accessible. We have developed this platform named EET English by keeping students, tutors and coaching institutes in mind and providing English language learning and teaching solutions. We are selling our own courses directly to the students with recorded videos. Apart from that tutors can join us and create their own courses which are promoted by EET English and collected revenue is shared with them as per mutually agreed terms and conditions. Besides, tutors can access our English language learning content and create the batches for students if they are not able to create their own courses. Additionally, we provide the ultimate solutions of English language learning to coaching institutes, schools and colleges under white label product. Thus, our platform is not limited to only students but we have multiple ways and wider opportunities to reach and cater all those English language aspirants as well as assisting teachers and institute to flourish. We are offering all above listed services to our clients in the forms of web application as well as mobile application.
